newsitem.title: MEXICO: Ceramica places five-year $90 million Eurobond.
newsitem.headline: Ceramica places five-year $90 million Eurobond.

text.p: Contruction materials and tile producer Internacional de Ceramica SA de CV said on Monday it placed a five-year $90 million Eurobond on July 25.
According to information released through the Mexican stock exchange, the instrument had a coupon of 9.75 percent, or 375 basis points over similar U.S. Treasuries.
"A large part of these funds will be used in the prepayment of the company's bank debt, which will improve our cash flow, increase the average maturity of the debt and reduce risk," it said.
Co-leaders of the bond were Deutsche Bank AG and Banamex.
